text: Lachamp-Ribennes is a commune in the Lozère department in southern France. It was established on 1 January 2019 by merger of the former communes of Ribennes (the seat) and Lachamp.Arrêté préfectoral 28 September 2018, p. 135 ==See also== *Communes of the Lozère department ==References== Category:Communes of Lozère
title: Lachamp-Ribennes
